Stroms Discussions of Poetics was a philosophical book written by Storm Silverhand and published sometime before the destruction of the city of Phlan in the beginning of the 14 century DR.
A copy of Stroms Discussions of Poetics was left in Mantors Library in the city of Phlan as the city fell into ruins during a Rage of Dragons of the . The Heroes of Phlan came across the book in the librarys philosophy section in the , during the campaign to liberate the Old City from its master â€“ Tyranthraxus.
